content.question: ​Which of the following functions has the same end behavior as the rational function <math alttext="r"><mi>r</mi></math> given by <math alttext="r open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x squared minus 5 x plus 3 over denominator 2 x plus 6 end fraction"><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 1 half"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>
​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals x"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></math>
​<math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative x"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></math>
​<math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses equals x squared"><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals x"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
